snippet: Pinterest, a buzzed-about young start-up that lets people create collections of their favorite items on the Web, may be adding affiliate links to its users' posts, without notifying the users, to generate revenue from purchases made through the site.
abstract: Pinterest, a buzzed-about young start-up that lets people create collections of their favorite items on the Web, may be adding affiliate links to its users' posts, without notifying the users, to generate revenue from purchases made through the site.

headline.main: Is Pinterest Already Making Money, Quietly?
